name: Siege (WolfeBou Games, Daniel Fraser, Jaylin Grierson)
name_original: Siege (WolfeBou Games, Daniel Fraser, Jaylin Grierson)
description:
Siege is a tower-defense game in which the players hold off an ever growing swarm of monsters using whatever items they have at hand, including books, fireballs, and chamber pots. |

Siege was created as part of a 4-day game jam intended to create games for a physical arcade cabinet. The game has been modified for easy playing on PC.
